nodes.text: Eric Vonlick was a male Human living during the Eternal Empire conquest. By 3630 BBY he was wanted by the Eternal Empire for sabotage, murder, theft and treason. He was last seen in Zakuul lower city and his wanted poster was displayed in the Overwatch.
Eric Vonlick appears during Chapter 10: Anarchy in Paradise of Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire on a wanted holo-poster.
